unduwave.undu_modules.undu_prepare¶

Classes¶

undu_prepare

_summary_

Module Contents¶

class unduwave.undu_modules.undu_prepare.undu_prepare(undu_api)¶

_summary_

Args:

undu_api (undu_api): Standard Parameters used for the simulation

Ini wave-prepare class for setting everything up for calcs

create_fresh_clc()¶

Writes/Wrote the clc file from some parameter list - but this is deprecated for now

create_fresh_nam()¶

Updates the nam file from parameters.

Loads the input file set in undu_paras, updates properties based on other undu_paras properties,and copies the resulting file to the Undu program folder.

create_undu_input()¶

Creates all the files needed as input for Undumag.
